title: Young hands
creator_credit: W. H. Shepherd, John Martin-Jones, Australian National Film Board and Dept of the Interior
brief_description: Depicts the activities of Young Farmers Clubs in Australia. Two students from Pakistan and Indonesia, visit the club meeting, learn the aims of the club and see how the group functions.
creator_credit_for_label: W. H. Shepherd, John Martin-Jones, Australian National Film Board and Dept of the Interior
